summary: Arthur Poppington, a regular man who adopts a superhero persona, known as "Defendor", combs the city streets at night, in search of his archenemy, Captain Industry.
cast: Woody Harrelson|Elias Koteas|Michael Kelly|Sandra Oh|Kat Dennings|Clark Johnson|Lisa Ray|A.C. Peterson|Kristin Booth|Charlotte Sullivan|Tony Nappo|Ron White|David Gardner|Bryan Renfro|Max Dreesen|Matt Gordon|James Preston Rogers|Graham Abbey|Michael Cram|Lyriq Bent|Tatiana Maslany|Peter Stebbings|Dakota Goyo|John Paul Ruttan|Ryan Dineen|Jim Ladd|Cynthia Amsden
title: Defendor
